pullRequest.title: [HUDI-836] [BLOG] Monitor Hudi metrics with Datadog
pullRequest.bodyText:
Reference

#1603
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HUDI-836

Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: Given this is the first blog post move, may be we can standardize on having the release number up front..?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+---
+title: "Monitor Hudi metrics with Datadog"
+excerpt: "Introducing the feature of reporting Hudi metrics via Datadog HTTP API"
+author: rxu
+category: blog
+---
+
+## Introduction
+
+[Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/) is a popular monitoring service. In the upcoming `0.6.0` release of Apache Hudi, we will introduce the feature of reporting Hudi metrics via Datadog HTTP API, in addition to the current reporter types: Graphite and JMX.

nodes.bodyText: Add a separate section before introduction, called release or availability? That calls out 0.6.0 (unreleased)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+---
+title: "Monitor Hudi metrics with Datadog"
+excerpt: "Introducing the feature of reporting Hudi metrics via Datadog HTTP API"
+author: rxu
+category: blog
+---
+
+## Introduction
+
+[Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/) is a popular monitoring service. In the upcoming `0.6.0` release of Apache Hudi, we will introduce the feature of reporting Hudi metrics via Datadog HTTP API, in addition to the current reporter types: Graphite and JMX.

commit.message:
[HUDI-836][BLOG] Monitor Hudi metrics with Datadog

Add a new blog post introducing Datadog metrics reporter.

afterCommit.message:
